name: Dark Desire Mute 2
description:
Dark Desire Mute 2
This VISUAL NOVEL continues the life of the girls in the Cindy universe, even at different ages. This way you can explore all kind of kinks and pleasures and topics.
The story continues right after Dark Desire 6 Episode 08 - Mission GO.
Episode 01 - The Bra Campaign
Episode 01 - Additional second path = introducing Addison Moore (M's Asian neighbor)
Episode 02 - Rekindled Flame
Episode 02 - Additional second path = Stephanie and Alec
Episode 03 - A Tough Road Ahead
Episode 03 - Additional second path = introducing Beth and Katie (Stephanie's SOFI models)
Episode 04 - The Shoot
Episode 04 - Additional second path = introducing Addison Moore (M's Asian neighbor)
Episode 05 - Mission Warehouse
Episode 05 - Additional second path = introducing Addison Moore (M's Asian neighbor)
Episode 06 - Mission Alexandre
Episode 06 - Additional second path = introducing Addison Moore (M's Asian neighbor)
The game is complete!
